_header: Though thou have a fair face
_description: A translation of Virgil, Ecologues II.17-18 — one quatrain (abab)

WorcF126.Transcription:
Þoȝ þou habbe a fayr [face]ne treyst þou
                    noȝt to meche þeronÞe primerole wile sone defaceblak
                    horte gedereþ many mon
